name: cue
description: Cue - 你的专属调研助理。基于 Multi-Agent 架构的深度研究工具，支持金融、商业、产业多领域调研。注意：本工具会创建本地持久化存储(~/.cuecue)、安装cron定时任务，并需要外部API访问权限。请查阅SECURITY.md了解安全详情。/ Cue - Your AI Research Assistant. Multi-Agent deep research tool with persistent monitoring capabilities. NOTE: Creates local storage at ~/.cuecue, installs cron jobs, and requires external API access. See SECURITY.md for details.
author: OpenClaw
